name: CORGI (CAMBRAY)
description:
The Glenumbran Corgi is a hardy working Dog from High Rock that is renowned for its intelligence and natural herding ability. There are two breeds of Glenumbran Corgi: the Cambray Glenumbran Corgi and the Daenia Glenumbran Corgi.

Known for its fierce loyalty and friendly demeanor, the Cambray Corgi is favored by farmers throughout High Rock. Their stocky build and short stature make them perfect for driving livestock through the province's rocky lowlands.
